name: Bon Appetit
description:
Shoot the evil croissants in AR to avoid getting eaten. You will hear them sneaking up on you, so be vigilant and fire at them with your pewpew guns before they reach you!

Thank you also to the guys at Immersal. This game has been used using the Immersal SDK (immersal.com)

Special thanks to Juho Korhonen for the amazing 3D graphics and music.
